title: Summoner name change [BUG]
body:
I recently changed my nick 
But some people in my friends list still see my old nick
The only way to fix this is by me removing them and adding them again
But this requires too much time
I wasted so much ip on this i don't want it to go to waste

replies.body: Only thing you have to do is relogg and your friends need to relogg, had the same "problem" but yeah, only a restart of the client was required

I tried that 
But it seems the only way is to readd

Did you change your name to one with special characters?  This could cause a caching issue, and re-adding friends would be the fastest way to force that update.  Unfortunately, there's currently no method of forcing that through.  I know that this may take some time, but hopefully not too long so your friends can see your new name!

"Paramount" is my new nick
And this only happens to some of my friends
Some of them can see the new nick some can't
Anyways ty
